entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -23.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 09:44 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
